sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { Button } from '../ButtonElements'; import { InfoContainer, InfoWrapper, InfoRow, Column1, Column2, TextWrapper, TopLine, Heading, Subtitle, BtnWrap, ImgWrap, Img } from './InfoElements' const InfoSection = ({ lightBg, id, imgStart, topLine, headline, lightText, darkText, description, buttonLabel, img, alt, primary, dark, dark2 }) => { return ( <> {topLine} {headline} {description} Get started{hover ? : } ) } export default InfoSection
